content: **materials** * yarns worsted/medium weight gold g brown b red r bernat premium yarn used * size 10 6 0 mm crochet hook hooks from laurel hill used * yarn needle bent tip needles from clover used **stitches** * chain = chain * st = stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet * half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet * double_crochet = double_crochet * tc = triple crochet * slip_stitch = slip_stitch * increase = single_crochet 2 into the same stitch * decrease = decrease over next two stitches single_crochet 2 stitches together or use invisible decrease * … = instructions in square brackets are performed in the same stitch
